summary: Why does the Dragonborn fight the same as everyone else? Shouldn't the Dragonborn use a different fighting style?
descriptionHtml:
Just some simple changes. The goal here is to stay as close to the vanilla key frames as possible to prevent OP animation changes while at the same time include the essence of different fighting techniques.


Released:
Boxing (Orthodox Stance) 7/3/2018

Upcoming Releases:
Boxing (South Paw)
Krav Maga
Muay Thai
GLIMA (ScandinavianÂ martial art used by the vikings)



Planned ideas:
H2H blocking
Blocking Animations
author: Pukes
